query: We are upgrading the air handling units supplying sterile wards in a hospital. We initially selected GDB 600x600 in standard Galvanized (FZ). Required airflow is 3,400 mÂ³/h per housing. Installation is indoors in a technical room. Please confirm if this configuration is suitable and provide the product code.

turns.content: We are upgrading the air handling units supplying sterile wards in a hospital. We initially selected GDB 600x600 in standard Galvanized (FZ). Required airflow is 3,400 mÂ³/h per housing. Installation is indoors in a technical room. Please confirm if this configuration is suitable and provide the product code.

For the sterile wards upgrade at the hospital, you've selected a GDB 600x600 housing with 3,400 mÂ³/h airflow. Given the hygiene requirements for medical/cleanroom applications, VDI 6022 recommends C5 corrosion resistance. The GDB housing with standard Galvanized (FZ) steel provides C2 corrosion resistance, which is not sufficient.To ensure the housing meets the necessary corrosion resistance standards for your application, I need to know which housing length is required.

clarification.why_needed: To ensure the housing meets the necessary corrosion resistance standards for your application.
clarification.question: Which housing length is required?

reasoning_paths.path: Material locked to FZ -> Filter 600x600mm -> Sized to 600x600 -> Code: GDB-600x600-R-PG-FZ
